casebody.data:
XPO LOGISTICS, INC.
v.
ANIS 395A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2017 Brian D. Boone, Attorney at Law, Mark T. Calloway, Attorney at Law, Michael Hoernlein, Attorney at Law, Julian W. DuRant, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Anis, Fouzi. David C. Wright, III, Attorney at Law, Douglas M. Jarrell, Attorney at Law, Brian L. Church, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for XPO Logistics, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of May 2017 by Defendant to Supplement the Record:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 6th of October 2017."
